subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
STEDT relates it to {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*wal||round; circular}}, which is also connected to {{och-l|圓|round}}, {{och-l|旋|id=2|to revolve; to return}}, {{och-l|環|ring}}, {{och-l|院|id=2|courtyard}}.

{{och-l|暈|halo}} is the same word ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). It is possibly related to {{och-l|雲|cloud}} ([[ibid.]]).

Additionally, {{zh-ref|Karlgren (1933)}} relates it to {{och-l|圍|id=1|to surround}}, and {{zh-ref|Wang (1982)}} to {{och-l|回|to return}}.
